ComicInfo.Title: Fit the First: Forks and Hope
ComicInfo.Summary: FIRST ISSUE! Roger Langridge is back! The Harvey Award winner behind THE MUPPET SHOW and THOR: THE MIGHTY AVENGER returns for an all new side-splitting adventure that can only be explained as…SNARKED! Journey with Langridge as he pulls the carpet out from under such Lewis Carroll classics as The Walrus and The Carpenter, Through the Looking Glass, and The Hunting of the Snark, creating an all new world of humorous grandeur. Join Princess Scarlett as she and her baby brother Rusty outwit the villainous royal advisors and team up with the infamous Walrus and Carpenter to set sail in search of their father, the Red King, who has been lost at sea for six months. It’s a rip-roaring industry event you won’t want to miss, featuring connecting covers by Roger Langridge, and a special 1:10 THOR:THE MIGHTY AVENGER homage variant by fan-favorite Chris Samnee!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 22:18:33. [CVDB294207]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Chris Samnee, Matthew Wilson, Roger Langridge
ComicInfo.Characters: Baker, Banker, Beaver, Bellman, Butcher, Cheshire Cat, Clyde McDunk, Count Osbert, Lord Kazmar, Mad Hatter, Madame Hecate, March Hare, Prince Rusty, Queen Scarlet, Red King, Wilburforce J. Walrus
